assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare no conflicts of interest.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: This study was approved by the Ethics Committee of the National Institute of Health Doutor Ricardo Jorge and was carried out according to the Principles of the Declaration of Helsinki of the World Medical Association. Samples were obtained after written informed consent of the participants or their legal representatives. Additional informed consent was obtained from all individual participants for whom identifying information is included in this article.
